message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $9,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay closer to $8,500. This product is valuable to me, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to consider my own needs. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value I know this product has. I'm counteroffering at $9,250. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $8,750, which is a fair compromise, considering the value we both see in this product.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8,750. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $9,100. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but $9,100 is still a bit high for me.  Let's split the difference. I'm willing to go up to $8,900, which is a fair compromise considering the value we both see in this product.  Let's close this deal and move forward.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8,900. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $9,050. This is getting close to my minimum, and I hope we can finally come to an agreement.
